title: Who were the greatest actors in the 1920s? - Quora

response.answer_text: Quora must have changed the question. The original that appeared in my feed was “Who was the most memorable actress of the 1920s?”, therefore, that's what I'll answer. Joan Crawford easily takes this win, as she continued to work for another 60 + years. However the most memorable is Marie Jean Falconetti. She had only one performance, in 'The Passion Of Joan Of Arc', revered today by many scholars and actors as possibly the greatest performance ever committed to film.
Garry cooper, John Barrymore, Rudolph Valentino, Charlie Chaplin, buster Keaton, Claudette Colbert, Greta Garbo, Olivia de Havilland, joan Crawford Etc Etc Legendary Actors and Actresses: 1920's
